DOC.criteria: Inclusion Criteria Patients must : HIV infection . Biopsyconfirmed glomerulosclerosis and/or mesangial proliferation within 90 day prior study entry . Mild severe renal insufficiency stable worsening . No AIDSdefining opportunistic infection malignancy . Exclusion Criteria Coexisting Condition : Patients follow symptoms condition exclude : Poorly control hypertension diabetes mellitus . Peptic ulcer disease gastrointestinal bleeding . Active symptomatic bacterial , protozoal , fungal , viral infection ( HIV disease ) . Superimposed renal disease due process focal glomerulosclerosis mesangial proliferation , include limited obstructive uropathy , acute tubular necrosis , prerenal azotemia . Emotional problem sufficient prevent adequate compliance study therapy . Concurrent Medication : Excluded : IV amphotericin B. IV aminoglycosides . IV foscarnet . IV pentamidine . Trimethoprim > 200 mg/day . Nonsteroidal antiinflammatory agent . Angiotensin convert enzyme inhibitor ( benzapril , captopril , enalapril , fosinopril , lisinopril , guinapril , ramipril ) except refractory hypertension . Concurrent Treatment : Excluded : Iodinated radiocontrast dye . Patients follow prior condition exclude : Active pulmonary disease chest radiograph within 60 day prior study entry . CMV retinitis ophthalmologic evaluation within 60 day prior study entry . Positive blood culture mycobacteria 1060 day prior study entry . Prior Medication : Excluded : Prior corticosteroid therapy HIVAN . Corticosteroid therapy indication within 30 day prior study entry . Continuous nonsteroidal antiinflammatory agent 15 day 4 week prior study entry . Prior Treatment : Excluded within 30 day prior study entry : Dialysis acute chronic renal failure . Iodinated radiocontrast dye . Required : Stable antiretroviral therapy AZT alone combination ddI , ddC , d4T least 4 week unless contraindicate . PCP prophylaxis TMP/SMX , pentamidine aerosol , dapsone , atovaquone . MAC prophylaxis rifabutin clarithromycin patient CD4 count < 100 cells/mm3 .
